author: dev_frustrated_42
title: Can't get my Shopify store to convert
content: I've spent 3 weeks trying to optimize my Shopify store but my conversion rate is still under 1%. I've tried everything - changed the theme
subreddit: rewrote product descriptions. Nothing works. I'm seriously considering hiring someone but don't even know where to start. Has anyone else dealt with this?

author: startup_sarah
title: Struggling with our landing page
content: Our SaaS startup launched 2 months ago and our landing page bounce rate is 78%. We desperately need someone who understands UI/UX and can redesign it. The current design was done by our backend developer and it shows. Budget is tight but we need help.

author: @small_biz_mike
title: Need help automating my business
content: I'm manually sending 200+ invoices every month and tracking payments in a spreadsheet. This is killing me. I need someone to set up automation but every quote I've gotten is $5k+. There has to be a better way to do this. Anyone recommend an affordable automation expert?

author: freelancer_jane
title: Desperate for a web developer
content: I'm a freelance designer and I keep losing clients because I can't offer development services. I need a reliable web developer partner who can handle React/Next.js projects. Every developer I've tried either ghosts me or delivers garbage code. So frustrated.

author: marketing_pro_alex
title: Our email campaigns are failing
content: We've been doing email marketing for 6 months with zero ROI. Open rates are 8% and click-through is basically 0. I think our copy is terrible and we need professional help with our email strategy and copywriting. Anyone know a good email marketing consultant?

author: agency_owner_tom
title: Can't scale my web design agency
content: I run a 3-person web design agency and we're drowning in work but can't hire fast enough. Our project management is a mess — using 5 different tools and nothing integrates. I need someone to set up proper systems and automation so we can actually scale.

author: hn_builder
title: Ask HN: How do you handle client onboarding?
content: We're a small dev shop and client onboarding takes us 2 weeks. Contracts
column7: Slack channels — it's all manual. I've been trying to automate this with Zapier but it's getting complicated. Has anyone built a proper onboarding automation?

author: ecom_newbie
title: I give up trying to do SEO myself
content: Spent $0 on ads and tried to do SEO for my dropshipping store. 6 months later I have 12 organic visitors per month. I clearly have no idea what I'm doing. Can someone recommend an affordable SEO freelancer who actually delivers results? Most seem like scammers.

author: @indie_dev@mastodon.social
title: My SaaS needs a complete redesign
content: Built my SaaS MVP as a solo developer and the UI is embarrassingly bad. Users keep churning because the interface is confusing. I need a designer who understands SaaS products and can do a full UX overhaul. Currently at 200 users but losing 30% monthly.

author: stuck_marketer
title: Need n8n/automation expert ASAP
content: I set up n8n for our lead generation pipeline but it keeps breaking. The workflows timeout
subreddit: and I can't figure out error handling. We're losing leads every day this is down. Need someone who actually knows n8n to fix and optimize our setup.
